description: Database query feature with parameter binding, supporting SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE operations with full integration to q:loop, q:if, and q:set

training_readiness.notes: Comprehensive coverage with 50 positive examples showing multiple implementation styles across all categories, plus 6 negative examples for error handling

example_diversity.implementation_styles: Shows 3-7 different approaches per pattern type including basic queries, JOINs, subqueries, CTEs, window functions, aggregations, and upserts
example_diversity.complexity_levels: Basic (10) -> Integration (10) -> Edge Cases (10) -> Real-World (10) -> Advanced (10)
use_cases: Parameter binding (string, integer, decimal, boolean, datetime, array)
example_diversity.multiple_solutions: Same problems solved with different SQL techniques: filtering (WHERE vs HAVING vs subquery), counting (aggregate vs accumulator), joining (explicit vs implicit), pagination (LIMIT/OFFSET vs window functions)

sql_operations.SELECT: Complete coverage with simple, filtered, sorted, limited, joined, and aggregated queries
sql_operations.INSERT: Covered with and without RETURNING, single and batch operations
sql_operations.UPDATE: Single and batch updates, conditional updates based on queries

parameter_types.string: Multiple examples with quotes and special characters

integration_patterns.q:loop: Result iteration, nested loops, grouped display
integration_patterns.q:if: Conditional queries, result validation, empty checks

advanced_sql.aggregations: COUNT, SUM, AVG with GROUP BY

real_world_scenarios.e_commerce: Product catalog, shopping cart, order processing
real_world_scenarios.reporting: Business reports with grouping and aggregation

dataset_quality.completeness: 100% - All required categories covered with 10 examples each
dataset_quality.diversity: High - Multiple SQL techniques for same use cases
dataset_quality.real_world_relevance: High - Production-ready patterns for actual applications
dataset_quality.integration_depth: Complete - Full coverage of feature interactions

llm_training_benefits.pattern_recognition: 50 examples provide sufficient data for pattern learning
llm_training_benefits.style_flexibility: Multiple approaches teach adaptable code generation
llm_training_benefits.practical_application: Real-world scenarios ensure generated code is production-ready
